Reviews.Content: we're satisfied!       in d living/dining room w/ my sis
Reviews.Author: graciee

Reviews.Content: Much overpriced for the quality I expected much better from a chain that advertise on being the top of the top for the business travelers!The price is definitely on the top: 8000S$ (5000USD) for a 2BR. Unfortunately the rest is a let down:- Cheap furnitures,- Cheap linen,- Some cockroaches in the kitchen with a strong musty smell,- Under standard appliances (small TV, noisy ref).- Very common breakfast (cheap cereals, scrambled eggs, bread, tea  coffee, that's all).- Small swimming pool, etc.The worst is that despite the hefty price they try to rip you more with lot of add-on:- Internet is not free (100S$/month and only 512Kbs bandwidth),- Cable TV doesn't include some basic channels (eg nothing for the kids),- Utilities is included only up to 250S$/month. And with 33掳C electricity for aircon will easily get you above it.So all together, I've been very disappointed and will avoid Somerset in the future!
Reviews.Author: TravelerInAsia
